title: Border, 1870–90
inscribed: Written on verso in ink: "Mrs. Horatio Rogers/No. Andover, Mass."
description: Frieze on textured off-white ground, brown, green and off-white floral motif interspersed with scrolled red and green foliage; top and bottom banding consists of brown ground, brown and off-white abstract flower and leaf motifs bordered in red with off-white dots.
